title: The Draymond Green Show - NBA Finals Game 1 Recap + Mailbag
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - NBA Finals Game 1 Recap + Mailbag
description:
The morning after losing Game 1 of the Finals to the Boston Celtics, Draymond Green gives his thoughts on how the game played out and what adjustments the Warriors can make, before discussing Adam Silver's 'State of the NBA' and answering mailbag questions. #Herd

Produced by: Jackson Safon

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
